name: codemask-oss
description: Open Source Code & Text Masker for LLM safety - Python and Text modes only

scripts.build: tsc && npm run build-ui && npm run copy-assets
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Using web-tree-sitter (WASM) - no rebuild needed' && npm run download-grammars || echo 'Grammar download failed, run npm run download-grammars manually'
scripts.build:win: npm run build && set CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false && electron-builder --win
scripts.build:win:clean: npm run build && rmdir /s /q %LOCALAPPDATA%\electron-builder\Cache 2>nul & set CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false && electron-builder --win
scripts.build:linux: npm run build && npm run clean:unpacked && electron-builder --linux
scripts.build:linux:deb: npm run build && npm run clean:unpacked && electron-builder --linux --config.linux.target=deb
